casebody.data:
Griffin GILDEN, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. KEANSBURG STEAMBOAT COMPANY, Defendant-Appellant. No. 371. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 18, 1931. Alexander, Ash & Jones, of New York City (Lawson R. Jones, Edward Ash, and Max Taylor, all of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Paul C. Matthews, of New York City (William S. Butler, of Brooklyn, N. Y., and Paul C. Matthews and Archibald P. Mc-Grath, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

_ Before MANTON, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
